title: Study Plan
subtitle: Plan your study schedule for upcoming exams
noPlanDescription: Create a study plan to organize your exam preparation with a smart schedule.
abandonConfirm: Are you sure you want to abandon this study plan? This cannot be undone.

wizard.title: Create Study Plan
wizard.step1Description: Choose which courses to include in your study plan
wizard.noCourses: No courses available. Upload some notes first!
wizard.step3Description: How much time can you study each day?
wizard.step4Description: Select any days you cannot study
wizard.step5Description: Mark lessons you already know well (they will be skipped)

widget.title: Study Plan
widget.createDescription: Organize your exam prep with a smart schedule

insightMessages.greatProgress: Great progress! You are ahead of schedule.
insightMessages.onTrack: You are on track. Keep up the good work!
insightMessages.slightlyBehind: You are slightly behind. Try to catch up this week.
insightMessages.significantlyBehind: You have several overdue tasks. Consider adjusting your plan.
insightMessages.almostDone: Almost there! Just a few more days of light review.
insightMessages.examTomorrow: Exam is tomorrow! Get a good rest tonight.
insightMessages.examToday: Exam day! You have prepared well. Good luck!
